invention-title: Novel circular injection process for blast furnace gas based on biomass gasification reforming oxygen
基于生物质气化重整氧气高炉煤气的循环喷吹新工艺

abstract.p: The invention provides a novel circular injection process for oxygen blast furnace gas based on biomass gasification reforming, which comprises the following steps: directly conveying oxygen blast furnace top gas into a biomass gasification reforming furnace, and carrying out gasification reforming to obtain high-temperature reducing gas; one part of the high-temperature reducing gas is directly injected into the furnace from a lower hearth tuyere of the oxygen blast furnace, the other part of the high-temperature reducing gas is mixed with cold-state hydrogen-rich gas to obtain low-temperature reducing gas, the low-temperature reducing gas is injected into the furnace from an upper furnace body tuyere of the oxygen blast furnace, and the gas enters the oxygen blast furnace to transfer heat and mass from bottom to top and then is discharged from the oxygen blast furnace; and the formed furnace top gas is recycled into the biomass gasification reforming furnace, so that the circulating injection of the blast furnace gas based on biomass gasification reforming oxygen is realized. According to the technology, a top combustion type gas heating furnace and a CO2 removal device of a conventional oxygen blast furnace are replaced, the energy consumption of the oxygen blast furnace technological process is reduced, the industrial practice reliability is high, and the technology has important significance on metallurgical energy structure transformation and low-carbon clean development.

本发明提供了一种基于生物质气化重整氧气高炉煤气的循环喷吹新工艺，将氧气高炉炉顶煤气直接输送至生物质气化重整炉中，经气化重整后获得高温还原气；将高温还原气一部分直接从氧气高炉的下部炉缸风口喷吹入炉，另一部分与冷态富氢煤气混合得到低温还原气，从氧气高炉的上部炉身风口喷吹入炉，气体进入氧气高炉内自下而上传热、传质，再从氧气高炉排出，形成的炉顶煤气再循环进入生物质气化重整炉中，实现了基于生物质气化重整氧气高炉煤气的循环喷吹。本发明的工艺取代了常规氧气高炉的顶燃式煤气加热炉、CO2脱除装置，减少了氧气高炉工艺流程的能耗，工业实践可靠性强，对冶金能源结构转型和低碳清洁发展具有重要意义。
